value:
If this is my fate...I will fight to ease
the sorrows of the people.

I must get back so I might protect my
homeland...and the future of the one
I love.

...Are you, too, in its grip? A power
beyond human reason... No, of
course not. Forget I said anything...

I want to study the techniques of
Heroes from other worlds...$k$pIt reminds me of my early days, as
one young knight among many.

You would do well to announce your
presence! I have not fully adjusted to
being surrounded by others just yet...

Walk the path of your beliefs. That is
the message I have for you, sent from
your friend $Nf.

I will not meet my end here. Despite
my misfortune, I must press on.
I must catch up.
Apologies...

With this, defeating us should not be
possible. Shame our foes will learn
as much only once it is too late...

I am...merely a traveler. You may call
me Sirius.

The Order of Heroes is a beautiful
thing. The patriots of a righteous
land... I can relate to that.$k$pI, too, gave up everything to fight for
my country, king, and people...$k$pEvery thrust of my lance reinforced
that there were no other paths for
me than to live and die as a knight.$k$pWhen I finally lost everything, I met
some people who showed me what it
meant to fight for those you love.$k$pIf I had known then what I know now,
perhaps I would have met with a
different fate—as would have others...$k$p...Ahem. I fear I've said too much.
Please, forget all that. Now, I fight
for you alone, and that is all I am.
たあっ
参る！
うっ…
まだだ…！
Prepared, are you?
No escaping this!
How irksome...
Ah! Some amusement!
I'm sorry…
(Sigh)
I am...merely a traveler. You may call me Sirius.
Desist. You won't see under my mask.
Duty keeps me from being with my beloved — ensuring she's safe is the best I can do.
I suspect it will be Prince Marth who finaly releases Lord Hardin from his suffering...
I must return home. I have someone waiting for me.
I must shake off the sparks that fall upon me...
A temporary guise for a temporary home—but my trust in you is genuine.
Done.
Hmm...
Your orders?
